abstract: Jason Baldwin, Damien Echols and Jessie Misskelley Jr., who in August were freed from prison after nearly 20 years, are expected at a premiere screening of "Paradise Lost 3: Purgatory," the latest entry in a documentary series that has chronicled their case.

headline.main: West Memphis Three Will Attend New York Film Festival
